line_1: He in his bosom plac'd a sprig,
line_2: And put on his best philibeg,

line_1: With coral root and amber sprig
line_2: While Israel sits beneath his fig,

line_1: Where's my Garnet, Cap and Sprig?
line_2: Send for SINGE to dress my Wig:

line_1: Emerg'd from his Grizzle, th'unfortunate Sprig
line_2: Seems as if he was hunting all Night for his Wig;
